ygData.subject: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: With all the changes to Mages, Enchanters and Necros does anyone know of any changes for Wizards coming up? I mean Enchanters seem to be ruling the game now,
ygData.messageBody:
With all the changes to Mages, Enchanters and Necros does anyone know of any
changes for Wizards coming up?


I mean Enchanters seem to be ruling the game now, with all the Enchanter
only quests and new abilities they are the most powerful class in the game.
At this rate they may have to change the name of this game to
"EnchanterQuest". Now I know they added the Tarton's Wheel quest for us
wizards but that isn't going to help me until I get closer to 49th and can
actually use the runes.

Aljernon of Karana
27th Level Wizard
